## host.Api.version() method

Retrieves the host's version.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
version(): Promise<Version>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Version](./smokeball-client-sdk.host.version.md)<!-- -->&gt;

the current version of the host.

## Example


```
const version = await sdk.host.version();
```
